workshop.title: Oracle Application Express
workshop.description: This series of hands-on labs is designed to teach you how to build applications using Application Express. The primary vehicle for teaching is a single use case which is expanded on with each lab.

labs.title: Hands-on Overview
labs.description: This includes an overview and the prerequisites to run the hands-on labs

labs.title: Unit 1: Getting Started with Oracle Application Express
labs.description: Login to Oracle Application Express and navigate through the major components

labs.title: Unit 2: Using SQL Workshop
labs.description: Load tables and data and create a look up table

labs.title: Unit 3: Creating a Database Application
labs.description: Create a database application from scratch, from a spreadsheet, and using a websheet application

labs.title: Unit 4: Managing Pages in Page Designer
labs.description: Navigate through the page designer panes and add a chart region and edit the chart attributes

labs.title: Unit 5: Developing Reports
labs.description: Create classic, interactive reports and interactive grids

labs.title: Unit 6: Managing and Customizing Interactive Reports
labs.description: Customize an interactive report as a developer and an end user

labs.title: Unit 7: Managing and Customizing Interactive Grids
labs.description: Customize and interactive grid as a developer and an end user

labs.title: Unit 8: Creating and Using Forms
labs.description: Create a form and link to a report

labs.title: Unit 9: Creating Application Page Controls
labs.description: Create and update page items, and regions

labs.title: Unit 10: Adding Computations, Processes, and Validations
labs.description: Create and use computations, processes and validations

labs.title: Unit 11: Implementing Navigation in your Application
labs.description: Update the Navigation Menu entries, and include icons for each entry

labs.title: Unit 12: Using Themes and Theme Styles
labs.description: Update the navigation lists,create and use Theme Styles

labs.title: Unit 13: Implementing Security in your Application
labs.description: Create and use authorization and authentication schemes

labs.title: Unit 14: Adding Additional Pages to your Application
labs.description: Add calendar, charts, and Tree pages in your application

labs.title: Unit 15: Creating and Using Dynamic Actions and Plug-ins
labs.description: Create and Use Dynamic Actions on the Project pages, installing and using a Plug-in

labs.title: Unit 16: Migrating Application Development Between Environments
labs.description: Import and export an application along with the underlying database objects and seed data
